
----------------------------------
db4o Replication System (Drs)
----------------------------------


Getting Started
----------------------------------

For the fastest start with Drs, please work through the tutorial, 
available in different formats in the following folder:
./doc/tutorial/

Then you can work with the ./QuickStart example as the basis for 
your first Drs project!

About this software
----------------------------------

The software contained in this distribution is the open source
db4o Replication System and is supplied by:

db4objects Inc.
1900 South Norfolk Street
Suite 350
San Mateo, CA, 94403
USA 

Make sure that you have downloaded the latest version from the
db4objects website:

http://www.db4objects.com

db4o Replication System may be used under the GNU General 
Public License, GPL. 

You should have received a copy of the GPL with the download.

Your db4objects team.
